title: What is the typical structure of a well-performing podcast? - Quora

response.answer_text: Podcast audiences thrive on regularity and repetition. And so you can design your show then they will always know what to expect. My show goes like this Open introductionAdvertsGuest introductionQ&AWrap upI always use the same words to introduce and wrap up. Mine is an interview show. Podcasts about rowing for rowers Other show types include: magazine showeducation showopinion / discussion showStory showComedy showEach is slightly different.
